Description: Log in to access your account and continue your experience.

Reset.RequestPasswordDescription: Forgot your password? Don't worry, just enter the email associated with your account below, and we'll send you a TOKEN to reset your password.
Reset.ResetPasswordDescription: Please check your inbox (and spam folder, just in case!) for further instructions on how to reset your password. If you don't receive the email within a few minutes, please try again or contact our support team for assistance.
Reset.EndResetPasswordDescription: Success! Your password has been changed

Helpers.UpperLowerCase: Both upper and lower case letters
